page.title: 14RADSTOCK COUNCILLOR
page.content: We interviewed Mr Chalk who is a councillor for Norton Radstock town council.He has worked on the council for a year.The full council meets every six weeks but other commitees meet twice a month. Mr Chalk enjoys being a councillor because he likes helping people with their problems and seeing things done. Duties include meeting people and contacting other councils.This work takes up two evenings a week of his time but he does have other interests. He likes sport and also makes wine. He did not need any educational qualifications but only a residential qualification.The council have no financial problems because there is no overspending.Unfortunately there is no computer available to the council but they hope to have one soon.
